	choice0=ShortOptionWithValue_0 | choice1=ShortOptionWithValue_1

	/[ 	]*/- "-" combined_short_options_without_dash+=ShortOptionWithoutDash /[ 	]*/-

CombinedShortOption_Multi:
	CombinedShortOptions+=CombinedShortOption
;

	all_option_choices+=AllOptionChoice_0

	value=/(?<!(\w|\-))install(?!(\w|\-))/

	element0="=" element1=VERSION

	element0=PKG element1=OptionalCollection_0?

	element0=OptionSession_0? element1=OneMustPresentCollection_0 element2=OptionSession_0?

// base type for the DSL
VERSION:
    /[^=\s]+/ | STRING
;

ANY:
    STRING | /[\S]+/
;

PATH:
    /(?:\/)?(?:[\*\w\-\.]*\/)*[\*\w\-\.]+/ | STRING
;

DIR:
    /(?:\/)?(?:[\*\w\-\.]*\/)*[\*\w\.\-]+(?:\/)?/ | STRING
;
